name: Super Discus
overview: A Slovak game that was recently translated into English. The aim of this game, which academics also call the highest level of dumbness, is to arrive at a certain point in this maze that has been created by paranoiac brainiacs from a mental hospital in Pezinok, Slovakia. When having fits, they started to call themselves Sibylasoft...Recorded in patients' book on 9-12-1987. You start the game in a dry hole. Its smell reminds you of your home den. From there things can only go up!u
